scenario.label: When converting an address in the raw style

x:context.address: Line one Line two Line three Line four Line five

div.pre: Line one Line two Line three Line four Line five

test.label: you should get all the lines

div.pre: Line one Line two Line three Line four Line five

scenario.label: When converting a literallayout in the raw style

x:context.literallayout: Line one Line two Line three Line four Line five

div.pre: Line one Line two Line three Line four Line five

test.label: you should get all the lines

div.pre: Line one Line two Line three Line four Line five

scenario.label: When converting a programlisting in the raw style

x:context.programlisting: Line one Line two Line three Line four Line five

pre.code: Line one Line two Line three Line four Line five

test.label: you should get all the lines

pre.code: Line one Line two Line three Line four Line five

scenario.label: When converting a screen in the raw style

x:context.screen: Line one Line two Line three Line four Line five

pre.code: Line one Line two Line three Line four Line five

test.label: you should get all the lines

pre.code: Line one Line two Line three Line four Line five

scenario.label: When converting a synopsis in the raw style

x:context.synopsis: Line one Line two Line three Line four Line five

pre.code: Line one Line two Line three Line four Line five

test.label: you should get all the lines

pre.code: Line one Line two Line three Line four Line five

scenario.label: When converting a verbatim with inline markup in the raw style

x:context.programlisting: Line one Line two Line end of three start of four Line five

pre.code: Line one Line two Line end of three start of four Line five

test.label: the inline markup should be transformed.

pre.code: Line one Line two Line end of three start of four Line five

Line one Line two Line end of three
start of four Line five

scenario.label: When converting an address in the lines style

x:context.address: Line one Line two Line three Line four Line five

test.label: you should get all the lines

scenario.label: When converting a literallayout in the lines style

x:context.literallayout: Line one Line two Line three Line four Line five

test.label: you should get all the lines

scenario.label: When converting a programlisting in the lines style

x:context.programlisting: Line one Line two Line three Line four Line five

pre.class: language-none long numbered programlisting verbatim verblines

test.label: you should get all the lines

pre.class: language-none long numbered programlisting verbatim verblines

scenario.label: When converting a screen in the lines style

x:context.screen: Line one Line two Line three Line four Line five

test.label: you should get all the lines

scenario.label: When converting a synopsis in the lines style

x:context.synopsis: Line one Line two Line three Line four Line five

test.label: you should get all the lines

scenario.label: When converting a verbatim with inline markup in the lines style

x:context.programlisting: Line one Line two Line end of three Start of line four Line five

pre.class: language-none long numbered programlisting verbatim verblines

test.label: the inline markup should not cross line boundaries.

pre.class: language-none long numbered programlisting verbatim verblines

scenario.label: When converting a verbatim with inline markup in the lines style

x:context.programlisting: Line one Line two Line end of three Start of line four Line five

pre.class: language-none long numbered programlisting verbatim verblines

test.label: ID attributes should not be repeated.

pre.class: language-none long numbered programlisting verbatim verblines

scenario.label: When callouts are added to a verbatim element

x:context.programlisting: Line one Line two Line three Line four Line five

pre.class: language-none long numbered programlisting verbatim verblines

test.label: they should appear in the output

pre.class: language-none long numbered programlisting verbatim verblines

scenario.label: When callouts are added to a verbatim element

x:context.programlisting: Line one Line two Line three Line four Line five

pre.class: language-none long numbered programlisting verbatim verblines

test.label: they can extend the listing

pre.class: language-none long numbered programlisting verbatim verblines

scenario.label: When callouts are added to a verbatim element

x:context.programlisting: Line one Line two Line three Line four Line five

pre.code: ①Line one Line② two Line three ③ Line four Line five

test.label: plain mode also works

pre.code: ①Line one Line② two Line three ③ Line four Line five

scenario.label: When callouts are added to a verbatim element

x:context.programlisting: Line one Line two Line three Line four Line five

pre.code: ①Line one Line② two Line three ③ Line four Line five

test.label: markup can also be inserted

pre.code: ①Line one Line② two Line three ③ Line four Line five

scenario.label: When callouts are inserted into markup

div.programlisting: Line one Line two Line three Line four Line five

pre.code:
① Line one
Line ② two
Line three
③
Line four Line five

test.label: they interrupt that markup

pre.code:
① Line one
Line ② two
Line three
③
Line four Line five
